message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at $200. I think it's a great deal for the value it provides. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but $200 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Can you meet me in the middle?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $200 represents its true value, I'm willing to come down to $180. This is my final offer.
I'm still not sure about the price. I was thinking more along the lines of $150. Can you meet me at $150?
